author: mqp
title: A Community Vesting Dapp
description: As of December 2021, there does not exist a trusted, open-sourced, and go-to solution for vesting smart contracts in the Cardano community.
solution: My solution is combining pioneer vesting with on-chain voting, allowing users to vote on any vesting parameters while in a vesting contract.
experience: I am a Plutus developer. I was funded in rounds 4, 5, and 6 in Project Catalyst. I have experience completing a low-budget project on time.
